trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There were no other sightings in Omaha on or around July 1st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side my house talking with my neighbors and it was late,We all noticed a large star like shape in the sky it was floating back and forth it was darting sapraticly in different directions.It then decended upon our house very quickly it was suddendly with out warning above my home floating there.It had many lights and a weird radiation was eminating from it it was very quiet it made No noise at all. It was there and every one could see it we tryed to call the news but none of our phones would work.The ship had what looked like pods of some kind on the botom of it.It realesed them and they abruptly fell on to my lawn them imediatly relesing some kind of light it was bright and cool then they dissapeared in a flash of light.My neighbors and I stood there in shock as it immediatly dissapered just as soon as it had came.
Summary: Giant ufo ship hovering above my house
